JournalType.name: JournalType
JournalType.description: Represents the category of transactions. For example: accrual, redemption.

Description.description: Detailed description of the journal type.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the journal type.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ProcessType.description: Required. The process type associated with the journal type.
